title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS COMPILATION / THE POWER OF THE GAZE
description:
This is a compilation of different non-verbal hypnotic states. Each of them with his benefits. Non-verbal hypnosis can heal us, connect us with our deepest selves, with nature and the universe. It has a powerful liberation effect, healing our traumas and negative emotions. Fascination - the power of the gaze is the main key to all of these hypnotic states and Dr. Paret will tell us some important secrets about it. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
